googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Susette Davis
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I called on a Saturday evening because we had an emergency. When he answered the phone I asked if he did 24/7 emergency calls. He hung up. Thinking it may have been an accidental disconnect, I called back. Nope. He hung up on me and wouldn't answer the phone and he never called me. Gave our $1000 repair to another plumber.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Blount Plumbing Service

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Blake Richardson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very professional and quick to get the job done. Will be using again
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Blount Plumbing Service

plumberResearchFull.json:
Here is the detailed information about Blount Plumbing Service in Alabama, based on the provided identifiers:

## Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**:
  - Blount Plumbing Service holds a license number of MP-3848, issued by the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board[1].

- **Physical Location and Service Areas**:
  - The business is located at 1692 River Bend Cir, Hayden, AL 35079-3227. It serves both commercial and residential clients in the area, though specific service areas are not detailed beyond Hayden and its surroundings[1].

- **Hours and Payment Methods**:
  - There is no specific information provided about the business hours or payment methods. However, it is mentioned that the business is operational and can be contacted through the provided phone number and email[1].

- **Years in Operation**:
  - Blount Plumbing Service has been in business since January 1, 2017, making it approximately 8 years in operation as of the current date[1].

## Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**:
  - The business provides a wide range of services including installation, repair, maintenance, water heater services, drain cleaning, sewer contracting, sewer cleaning, sewer inspection, pipe thawing, leak repair, and leak detection. They also handle plumbing fixtures and other related services[1].

- **Service Areas Covered**:
  - While the exact service areas are not extensively detailed, it is clear that they serve the Hayden area and likely surrounding regions[1].

- **Emergency Service Availability**:
  - There is no explicit mention of emergency services, but given the comprehensive nature of their services, it is plausible they may offer emergency or urgent plumbing services, though this is not confirmed[1].

- **Prices or Rates**:
  - There is no information provided about specific prices or rates for their services[1].

## Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**:
  - There are no detailed review summaries available from the provided source. However, it is mentioned that the BBB does not have sufficient information to issue a rating, indicating a lack of reviews or complaints on the BBB platform[1].

- **BBB Rating and Status**:
  - Blount Plumbing Service is not a BBB Accredited Business. The BBB does not have sufficient information to issue a rating for this business[1].

- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**:
  - Since there are no reviews provided in the source, common customer feedback themes cannot be determined[1].

- **Response to Reviews**:
  - There is no information available on how the business responds to reviews, as there are no reviews listed[1].

## Owner & Staff:

- **Owner/Management Information**:
  - The owner of Blount Plumbing Service is Mr. Joseph Palmer. He is also listed as the principal and customer contact for the business[1].

- **Staff Qualifications**:
  - There is no detailed information provided about the qualifications of the staff beyond the fact that the business is licensed by the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, indicating that the staff must meet the necessary professional standards[1].

- **Professional Certifications**:
  - The business holds a valid license (MP-3848) from the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, which is a professional certification in the plumbing industry[1].
aboutUs: Blount Plumbing Service is a locally owned and operated plumbing company serving the Hayden area and its surroundings. Our team of highly skilled and licensed professionals specializes in a comprehensive range of services, including installation, repair, maintenance, water heater services, drain cleaning, sewer contracting, sewer cleaning, sewer inspection, pipe thawing, leak repair, and leak detection. We take pride in our expertise and commitment to delivering top-notch plumbing solutions tailored to your specific needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted and licensed plumbing partner dedicated to providing exceptional service and lasting solutions.
sellingPoints: Licensed by the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, ensuring adherence to industry standards and regulations.
Comprehensive range of services, from routine maintenance to complex installations and repairs, all under one roof.
Personalized attention and tailored solutions, with a focus on understanding your unique plumbing requirements.
